General.Name: Shinsegae Inte
General.Description: Shinsegae International Co., Ltd. operates as a fashion retailer in South Korea. It offers fashion, beauty, and lifestyle brands. The company also designs, manufactures, and distributes fashion, beauty, and living products. It operates through a network of approximately 860 stores. The company was founded in 1979 and is based in Seoul, South Korea.

1.Title: Assistance VP of Global Fashion 2nd Division & Director
